website_summaries.verdict: This studio-quality aerial yoga swing kit comes in 6 different vibrant colors with a 100% satisfaction guarantee and a load capacity of 200 lb.
pros: Really good swing seat size on this model
cons: Many users disappointed that it comes with no instructions

customer_reviews.title: Relieve back pain! Best quality and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am having so much fun in my yoga swing! I was a little hesitant to buy this brand because it is cheaper than some other brands. I am very impressed with the quality of the fabric and the ropes. I have mine attached to a ceiling joist in my house using hammock hooks. Just find the stud! There's something about inversions that create this positive energy and put you in the best mood! I am a yoga instructor and I plan on using this during private lessons for people with lower back tension. Love my yoga swing!
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Finally pain free after first day!
customer_reviews.text: After years of lower back pain and sleepless nights, I finally have been pain free and sleeping easily. I've only had it for 3 days! The results were instant! Thank you UpCircleSeven!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: I like it sooooo much!
customer_reviews.text: My first swing, so I'll be honest I don't have much to compare it to . But the material is very sturdy, I bought some IKEA hooks to hang them from indoors .
customer_reviews.author: P&G J

customer_reviews.title: Caution with your life!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was nearly very injured on this swing yesterday. After having been used by. 70lb year old girl for less than 1 year the “sturdy steel” hooks wore so thin that one snapped while she was on it and she fell to the ground. Thank God she was not upside down at the time otherwise there would be more than the current bump and bruise. The other hook looks like it would snap any second if it were used again. What kind of steel can’t withstand a child’s weight!? Supposedly holds 550lbs??? I am beyond furious and would not recommend buying this. My daughter loves yoga and is devastated. She enjoyed having a swing until now.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Lee

customer_reviews.title: I'm a bigger woman and was worried about this product but it's held up well and feels very sturdy! I haven't been using it long but I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for two weeks now and am loving it so far. I'm a bigger woman and was worried about this product but it's held up well and feels very sturdy! I haven't been using it long but I've already grown more used to it and has helped build up strength! LOVE the product and will recommend to everyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Terry

customer_reviews.title: Well Made. Just One Problem...
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and fun to use. One problem: the swing is connected to the carabiner (which hooks into the support strap) by a sturdy rope, however, you have to tie it into the carabiner with a knot and if the knot is not well done, it may slide out, which is what happened when I used it the first time. Thankfully I only ended on my butt (and only my pride was hurt). Maybe I am especially in-dextrous and "knot-stupid"but I will try some redneck engineering to make that connection safer, especially if I use the swing with my head down LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely amazing do not wait to purchase yours!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with lower back pain for years and I could go to the chiropractor and be great for the day or two and then everything would be back to normal which for me is pain. I saw this trapeze advertisement and since I already do yoga I thought this might be something to try and I am extremely glad that I did. I use this trapeze several times a day and can tell you that it has worked wonders for my lower back pain. I feel absolutely great being able to get such a deep stretch on the trapeze. I do recommend it to anyone who is thinking about purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Moonshadow

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: The first one we hung it up and noticed a few holes in it, I emailed them and they sent me another one right away! They are easy to work with. The swing itself is great for the price! I can't complain! Beware there aren't any instructions on hanging it but there are plenty of online sources to different how to! And remember to buy some bolts for ceiling as they do not come with it! I don't have any complaints with my product and I'm very please with it! Mine I have on two hooks and I use the daisy chain but move it to one hook for when I'm doing yoga on my mat!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela B.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying It!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is strong and comfortable, not stiff, scratchy or stretchy. I ordered the turquoise and the color is vibrant. The only area which needs improvement are the carabiners. They are cheaply made, too small and have very sharp edges. I bought Fusion Climb Contigua II Military Color Edition Grooved Straight Gate Key Nose Carabiner Black 5-Pack on Amazon, removed the rope and all four carabiners and replaced them with the good quality aluminum carabiners directly through the fabric of the swing and handles. Now it is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Boehle

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and good quality swing!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know much about aerial yoga until I got this swing. Now I look forward to getting in it every night to stretch out and just hang! So easy to put up, you can figure it out yourself or check out YouTube. This swing is good quality, though, I have nothing to compare it to. It seems perfect and it gets the job done. I love the bright green color, it looks nice on my back porch, I don't even worry about taking it down when I am not using it. If you are at all interested in giving aerial yoga a try, buy this swing and check out some moves on line.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ross

customer_reviews.title: Zen Af
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up but we did have to go to YouTube to watch the set up. I have degenerative disc disease and mobility/range of motion issues and this does help. I've been looking online at different poses and stuff. We got the Ikea hook, but I've been thinking about getting a stand. It was on sale with I got it and I'm very happy for the price I paid. Don't judge my messy house I'm disabled with 3 youngins haha!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga trapeze/swing!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new yoga swing! I was originally going to use this with a chin up bar in a doorway but didn't find it was high enough so I ended up buying ceiling hooks and it's PERFECT. Really love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Multiposition Swinging Climax!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to find something that could replace the old metal trapeze on our outdoor swing set, that could be fun and whimsical looking, but also facilitate kinky late night outdoor romps where numerous positions are possible... this sure met/exceeded expectations! It’s comfortable for a partner, no matter the position or duration of activities prior to climax. This is totally worth it, even if you only used it once!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: best b-day gift ever, high quality
customer_reviews.text: got this for my daughter who dances and likes to climb, etc. and we are just blown away by the quality. I figured she's small, why spend $200 when she could just try out this one instead. Best decision ever! Easy to hang (bought the hardware @ Lowe's) and super sturdy, I tried it out myself. I can't imagine trying to use this without the black straps, they make adjustment a breeze. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: A Grant

customer_reviews.title: Everything I'd hoped!
customer_reviews.text: I had this swing in my cart for 6 months, and just couldn't commit to the purchase. Finally, I starting having debilitating back pain so I decided to go for it. One of the best purchases I have made! There are so many videos online that you can follow in order to get the optimal benefits of your swing. I LOOOVVVEEEE hanging like a bat, and my back is feeling much better after just a week! My kids also love the swing, and use it to hang as well. I highly encourge anyone who is considering this swing to GO FOR IT! Hang it near a smart TV so you can access tutorials to help develop your practice. Happy Hanging!
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Tardis

customer_reviews.title: Great swing, start slow and feel instant relief
customer_reviews.text: I've seen the yoga swing for awhile, but I was always too intimidated. I got this one and I love it! I have mounts in my basement or outside that work perfectly to hang from. The first day was a little rocky, but each day I practice and get way more confident!! Best part is anytime my hip or lower back hurt, I just go hang for several minutes and it provides a bunch of relief. An added bonus to aerial yoga, it has given me an entire new confidence level.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to try new stretches
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a yoga swing for a while as it has always looked like a fun way to stretch. It did not disappoint. Very easy to set up and appears to be sturdy as well. I did a few lower back stretches and that felt really wonderful. Can't wait to use it more. Also, I want to give a shout out to their Customer Service. They've been very quick to respond and keep me in the loop on my order, plus very open to answer any questions. Definitely a bonus to have a great company behind the product.
customer_reviews.author: thunker

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this yoga swing! I am new to aerial yoga and this was a perfect purchase to get me started. One thing, I did have to invest in a longer set of daisy straps. The ones that come with the swing are good quality but we’re too short for how I was trying to use the swing. I picked up a cheap pair for $10 and problem solved. My favorite thing is to find a low hanging tree branch and set up in the park. So relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisAW

customer_reviews.title: My first rodeo!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a smaller bag than expected, but after I pulled it out and put it together, I was impressed with the packaging! I thought the fabric would be a little more forgiving, this is why I gave 3 stars for pain relief. It feels good to hang upside down, but the fabric is cutting into my legs and lower back. I received an email stating I may or may not have received the booklet with the delivery, I didn't. I had to print the booklet and I've used it alot for the different positions. I only wish the fabric was a little more giving and softer, otherwise, I like the concept and trying to get better every day.
customer_reviews.author: cynschl

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Swing!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this swing! I have practiced yoga for 24 years and this swing has taken my yoga practice to another level! It has also been wonderful for my spinal injuries. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Angel M.

customer_reviews.title: Trapeze for all!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color! Has a great seat. My husband has been struggling with back pain that opioid medications don't touch. Today we got our swing and he was doubtful that some fufu swing would help. After 7 minutes of inversion he was a believer. Don't waste $100 on a product that you can get for $32 with Upcircleseven. Thank you for making it affordable to everyone Upcircleseven!
customer_reviews.author: CassMathis

customer_reviews.title: Take Time to Tie Knots Correctly
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. Boyfriend got a minor injury because I didn't tie knot correctly. I appreciate the limited packaging and digital info but I'd recommend putting tying instructions on or in the actual package. Overall I really like this.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. My kids do, too. The price was perfect. I am a big girl, and a beginner to yoga swings, but have really enjoyed learning with this.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Hoped it would help sciatica pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought for back traction and stretching. Severe sciatic pain led me on a search for relief of any kind and this looked promising. Unfortunately I havent really felt any relief. I wish it was made of a little more comfortable fabric because this has no stretch to it and causes hanging upside down by the hips to be extremely painful. Might be good for yoga moves but not for what I bought it for. Also I wish the handles were attached so they don't roll. Hard to hang onto if you dont have He-Man hands. In fairness, it does seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnee

customer_reviews.title: Love this swing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a hefty girl and was so interested in trying trapeze yoga and inversion therapy and bought this swing as opposed to another more expensive version in case I broke it. I have been using it for a little over a week now and while I weigh over 200lbs I haven’t had any signs of it falling from the ceiling or ripping. I loooove this swing so much. It’s a great addition to our at home gym since we like everyone else are at home. If you are unsure buy it because it’s super cool!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Low quality hand grips
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product after months of wanting something like this for my house. Installation was a pain as we had to go through a couple of orders of braces to hang it up (the ikea one that amazon suggested was not heavy duty enough). I’ve had it for a month now and the rubber cover on one of the handles has already broke off. Unacceptable to me. Low quality
customer_reviews.author: Signa

customer_reviews.title: I just got opened my cyan colored yoga swing. ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got opened my cyan colored yoga swing. The color is just what I wanted. I haven’t used it yet but right out of the box, it is much smaller than I thought it would be. I have taken an anti-gravity yoga class and the swings were a lot bigger. Also as I was adjusting the straps I found a stain. I am probably going to be returning this because this may have been used.
customer_reviews.author: Hribal

customer_reviews.title: Get more for less $
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I went with this swing over the more expensive one. It has more accessories and is a lot cheaper. I hung it in a doorway with the recommended Ikea hooks and some 3/8in lag bolts bought locally. It was a little unnerving at first, I wasn't sure it would hold my 200lb self but after a few uses I feel more comfortable that it won't dump me on the floor. The swing never made a peep. I wish it came with a paper manual but the PDF that came to my inbox as soon as I purchased the swing was a good starting point to see some basic stretches. Look on YouTube for more.
customer_reviews.author: William W

customer_reviews.title: The wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a present for the wife and she loves it. The color is great. She often takes naps in it. The only thing that concerns me is having to keep an eye on the knots. If a knot slips out your on the floor! When received there were two different knots made and one of them was not the right type and could have had a dangerous outcome.
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners, excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This yoga swing is absolutely AMAZING! I have it set up in my guest room, and I use it all the time. I usually use YouTube to find videos on different posts, and my little ones love to sit and swing in it, with our supervision. This was an excellent purchase! The material quality is 10/10, I've experienced no tips or tears, and it hasn't gotten dirty yet. I'm very happy with this purchase, and look forward to continuing to expand my aerial skills!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Do not use the knot they tell you to use
customer_reviews.text: I love my swing once I modified it! I followed the instructional video on YouTube and check everything like it said. The knot they had to hold the swing up was horrible. I ended up falling and bruising my back! Luckily my husband knows how to tie different knots and was able to to tie a knot that has held me up ever since. So the product is good but do not use a single knot like the asked you to do.
customer_reviews.author: Christa A

customer_reviews.title: I hate to find out opening a package that product doesn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate to find out opening a package that product doesn’t come with ANY instruction on how to install or use it. It came with a card asking me to get an ebook on a website, which I had to fill a form and still wait for it to be sent by email hours later. Ughhhh. Is it too much to print a manual?? Glad there is YouTube and I was able to find installation tips from another brand of swings.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Pesco

customer_reviews.title: Yoga is more ... fun now. :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool product. Set up is easy (make sure you measure your proper arm distance- I made a mistake the first time). There is a learning curve for trapeze yoga- but there's plenty of free tutorials online. I would mention if you have a history of sinus problems you may be disappointed at how uncomfortable it is to do inverted/upside down things. I'm hoping I get acclimated over time but the head pressure can be pretty fierce.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel the Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I picked this one. The fabric is soft and bright. I am brand new to yoga and I’m not sure of my goals except to feel better. Do be careful when starting out. There’s channels on YouTube and Instagram showing you how to use this. It’s a really wonderful product and the kids use it as a swing on gloomy days
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Fun, Relaxing... A+ Product
customer_reviews.text: I am only 4 days in, but to say I love this thing might be an understatement. I am working out muscles I didn't even know I had - without realizing it. This is the first body toning I have taken part in that I actually look forward to each day. The swing is great for relaxation too - big enough to sit in comfortably to read or enjoy the breeze. Study enough to flip around on, and really does help relieve some lower back pain if you are willing to try the inversions. I adore it!
customer_reviews.author: Dani W

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but confusing instructions because they refer to items ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but confusing instructions because they refer to items that aren’t always the same as what is in the package. Like referring to and picturing a rope when what was in our package was not really a rope. Also, the instructions were only provided to us online which was difficult to view on the device I had available. It’s great once it’s installed though. I would recommend getting ceiling hooks.
customer_reviews.author: TheBeetIsTheMostIntenseOfVegetables

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted :)
customer_reviews.text: Super satisfied with this product. My only advice is buy the brackets for the wall when you buy this, they don’t sell the mounts in any major hardware store and it was a pain waiting for. Great quality and beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: N. DiBisceglie

customer_reviews.title: Great swing.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I've been wanting one of these for a long time - glad I finally got around to getting one. It is built very sturdy and I mounted it to ceiling beams using heavy duty swing mounts. I use it for hanging upside down to decompress my spine, as well as ariel yoga and some... ahem... adult activities. It is well built and easy to assemble and learn to use by watching YouTube videos and following the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST THING THATS EVER HAPPENED TO ME!!! All of my friends order one within a week! Look at reviews! All you need are hooks and 2 more grapples. This is perfect. Not stretchy! Very secure. I got a headache for a few weeks being upside down, take a Tylenol before you hang. You get used to it quickly! I was seriously born for this thing! Anyone can do it! It’s very easy and very challenging at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Alix Farrell

customer_reviews.title: So far, perfect
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to actually use it yet. As the spot I wanted to put it, wasn't as strong as I thought. This has nothing to do with the swing or the way it was made. The swing seems very well made, and the manual i received via email is very good. The material seems comfy and soft. I am very excited to use this product. And will add to my review after I can set it up and use it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Good product, be ready for no directions.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, not really sure how the blac k extension pieces work. Did not come with any kind of directions. Also bought the warranty, not sure how to use that if I needed to. Overall, could be hooked up, but would have been easier knowing what I was getting after it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Billy McGowan

customer_reviews.title: My wife has MS and I purchased this so she ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife has MS and I purchased this so she is able to stretch her legs more. I hung it so she is able to sit right down in it and is able to do more with this then she can on the floor or a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Frey

customer_reviews.title: Yeah another one with no ceiling mounts
customer_reviews.text: What’s with none of these companies putting ceiling mounts with the swing?! I thought this one did because it said it supported 550 pounds and guess what, no mounts! Man, I’m so tired of these phony descriptions. Just say in the title, “CEILING MOUNTS SOLD SEPARATELY” instead of trying to trick people into buying more of your crap.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Disassembled parts and no instructions on how to assemble them. Very frustrating and annoying. I'd rather spend 30 more dollars and get something with instructions and a DVD for beginners. I'm going to the pros this sucks
customer_reviews.author: The NEWEST Mrs. Devor

customer_reviews.title: Get inverted!
customer_reviews.text: This swing is one of the easiest and most fun ways to enjoy the benefits of flying upside-down 🙃 Love the orange color, and I often use longer looped hammock straps when hanging outside on thick branches.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Great structure and great price
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. I'm about 175 these days, and there's never been an "oh crap" moment on it yet. The material is wonderful. The assembly was very easy and the hanging straps make it adjustable. I can put it barely off the ground for my kids or high up for me. It is way cheaper than other brands and I think that's just the company being honest and kind, because there's nothing cheap about it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi K.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this was a purchase requested by my 8 year old daughter who is into acrobatics. She has had the best time learning the yoga poses and it's helping my 13 year old with her flexibility and back bends. We have this hanging on a large tree and it's very sturdy. This was easy to install with the PDF book that came with the swing and the video with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this aerial yoga swing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this aerial yoga swing! The only reason I am giving it a four star review, is that didn't come with any kind of instructions in the box. They send you an e-guide, but installation instructions are only for the ceiling installation. I hung mine on a pull up bar and works absolutely amazing! Love it! The product itself I would give five stars, but I'm giving four starts for not having a "clear" instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Lola138

customer_reviews.title: no drilling necessary
customer_reviews.text: Popcorn ceilings? No problem. I set this up in my apartment in the doorway. I had the good fortune of having longer daisy straps for my hammock. I used them to go around the doorway and through the ceiling tiles. The ones included would not be long enough however. Additionally, it hangs too low from the doorway and you do need 3 feet in all direction to do some moves, but it'll work if you have no other option. The product is great. The only reason I docked one star is because the package arrived looking like it had been through the ringer and no instructions or PDF were included or emailed.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all. The fabric has literally no give. I bought this based off of reviews and I’m honestly surprised no one mentioned this. It is so uncomfortable! I will be returning and trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: VERY well made and great instructions and videos for use on the website
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with UpCircleSeven. They sent a free guide via email and I've gone to their website several times since I am new to yoga swings. They show you how to check every little piece of the swing to look for any defects or wear to make sure that everything is 100% safe. I think this is a great swing and a great company than I'm happy to endorse!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Blue

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2020!
customer_reviews.text: This yoga swing is absolutely perfect, when it comes to quality, price, durability, it just can't be beat. I had my boyfriend mount mine to a beam in our ceiling, it was fairly easy to install f you have a handy man or even just a drill, stud finder and a ladder. For this price, it can't be beat. Great for yoga, core workouts, stretching, relaxing and having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes, yes!! Buy this one!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this one!!! It's perfect size! I can lay comfortably and I'm 5'61⁄2. Pregnant mom of 2! I use a small chirp wheel for my back and I've been suffering with severe jaw tension and one back bend in this was AMAZING!!! So much relief. Super easy set up, fabric is just right!! I love it and just got more motivation to stay fit through pregnancy!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a short time but so far it’s pretty great. My kids love it and I am still very new to it but so far so good. Also very quick delivery received it a day early. For the price I think it’s a good product. I do wish it would have came with a yoga guide and installation kit. I was however able to download the yoga guide online but it is a very large file to install on my phone. Over all I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mccoycar8

customer_reviews.title: Yoga swing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 swings. UpCircleSeven and another swing. I paid more for the UpCircleSeven because I thought I was getting more. The only more I got for my 30 dollars was a digital booklet that was emailed to me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eash

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because I've been dealing with some severe sciatic pain due to a herniated disc. I have a power rack that I can attach it to, so I can utilize both full inversion and lumbar traction while laying my upper back on the floor. This sling is very sturdy. I've never felt uncomfortable or afraid that I was going to fall, no matter what position I was in at the time. I would definitely attribute the reduction of pain to this, as well as other exercises that have increased my core strength. I would definitely recommend this sling.
customer_reviews.author: Gert2gorg

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Today I got my yoga swing finally installed and so far I love it. Watched the how to video and made sure the swing was ready to use and had no flaws with it. So far so good and has already given my lower back some relief by doing inversions. I definitely would recommend this for beginners like me. PDF was also very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Caledonia

customer_reviews.title: Holds weight.
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. Some imperfections but w.e. So far so good. Will update. Update: contacted CS and they were so gracious to allow for a return seeing as there were some fabric tearing or rather some minor imperfections as I stated. Received the return and all is well. Using the swing more and more seeing as I'm a beginner. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Aerial Begginer
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying learning my body with this aerial yoga, I really like that it is sturdy and the color is vibrant. It did not come with the hooks so you have to order those separately, they did send a begginer manual via email, which was great and discussed safety and a few begginer moves. I am satisfied and I am 200 lbs and it feels safe......
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Marie Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use this as of yet ... I did hang and install from my ceiling "I now have to purchase spackle" lol I made a few extra holes trying to find studs! But swing is well made and the color purple looks nice in my living room... the company has been amazing sending emails to see how I like my swing ... thank you
customer_reviews.author: Maya schatz

customer_reviews.title: this was supposed to come with instructions and a beginner ...
customer_reviews.text: this was supposed to come with instructions and a beginner guide. It had none of those. I don't know how to hook. I would give it a negative if I could.
customer_reviews.author: TAK

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I received my yoga hammock and currently have it set up in my house. It’s been working great and everything seems to be in awesome condition! I’ve been using it for inversions and deeper stretches every day since I got it. I was recently in a car accident and this yoga swing has helped me deal with all the stiffness that comes with that. Thank you guys so much for making a great product that is actually affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Easy install outdoors on a sturdy tree limb. Have been using first thing in the morning and has made a world of difference for my spine! I have scoliosis and struggle with certain yoga poses; this has helped my range of motion immensely. Overall impressed with the quality and stitching, sturdiness, ease of installation, and ease of use!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Swing - Make Sure to Buy Addition Products for Setup
customer_reviews.text: I love this Yoga Swing. My only complaint is it did not come with directions for setting up so I had to search on Google. Come to find out, it doesn't come with all the parts to set up so you will have to buy ceiling hooks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stretching in a while
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that it didn't get shipped with a "how to guide" but you can download one from their site. Other than that, it was easy to assemble & very stable. I am comfortable being on it with my weight, I am 175lbs. It definitely helps relax in many of the muscle groups, all while stretching!
customer_reviews.author: LUIS GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: This will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: Never in my life, could I see myself loving something so much! Seriously, buy it. Lol I have had years of back pain, for several reasons including sports and a bulging disk...my back hasn't felt this good in years, after one day of using it! Hard to believe, like me, but you will seriously be surprised. Not only that, but if you have a hard time finding a good workout that keeps you interested, jump in this boat. Lol. I am not in shape anymore, and I already broke a sweat, with no effort, and can't wait to get in it tomorrow. Get it! Life-changing..😄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun! Great exercise! Great pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have a swing indoors, I will never NOT have a swing indoors. My son plays on this every day. He never gets tired of it and it is great exercise for him. I hang up upside down every day to get relief from neck pain. My husband uses the handles to do pull-ups and dips. A family favorite item!!
customer_reviews.author: genissimo

customer_reviews.title: All looks good
customer_reviews.text: Received in timely manner... we have not put up yet though. Bought for my 10 year old daughter that likes to do silks at circus camp, seems somewhat similar... can hang upside down. Was sent PDF and Printed out info how to use the swing. Only complaint is no installation instructions. They directed me to you tube videos of similar products and also need to buy installation pieces. Seems good quality material. Company very easy to get in touch with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - requested next day free delivery and arrived as ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome - requested next day free delivery and arrived as scheduled. Exactly as advertised - can't wait to set up. Looks to be excellent quality. Doesn't come with swing hangers, which I notice are quite expensive - $18 - $24 whether you get them on Amazon or at a local hardware store. I plan on getting some heavy duty type of hooks other than swing hangers because there are many other options at my local hardware store for well under $18 that can hold up hundreds to thousands of pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Else

customer_reviews.title: Aerial Swing
customer_reviews.text: I love my Aerial Yoga Swing. What I like the most is that I am able to practice at home, at the park, or the beach. This swing has everything I ask for. Is very sturdy, easy use, and super fun! It is also good for all the family. My daughter and hubby use it as well. Highly reccomended to change up yoga practice and have fun with the family. Much appreciated with Upcircleseven. Always a pleasure to talk to! 🌹
customer_reviews.author: Edohran

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few weeks now and I love it, specially the color. It is fun, I feel comfortable and trust myself in it and I haven’t been having back pain after practicing in it. Ps: I purchased the ceilings hook separately and had a professional install it at home.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Caminero

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Amazed how much I love this product. I don’t use the swing part as much as I use the straps. I love to stretch out, do pull ups/push ups and back bends. My 7 year old loves it as well as my 14 year old son who plays football. I really love this swing and the price was excellent. It came within a few days and was nicely packaged in its own bag. I love, love, love this. The orange color is really great, too:)
customer_reviews.author: mitsi dupre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in tiny and cute packaging, easy to assemble, super sturdy and perfect for on the go. I'm really glad I opted for this one instead of the other more expensive one my friend bought. Her's is still in the box bc she can't figure out how to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Thinner Material than expected. Otherwise no complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and the color I wanted with all accompanying parts pictured, you will need your own mounting tools/bults/etc, and aside from the material looking and feeling much thinner and less sturdy I have no complaints. Couldn't include photo or video but it is worth doing so. it easily held both my 7 and 9 yr old daughters as well as myself (150lbs).
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters play room and it’s been amazing! She LOVES playing in it and will spend hours swinging and trying to recreate “Greatest Showman”. It’s a lifesaver on days when we can’t play outside! We use her old crib mattress as a crash pad underneath. I love to snuggle up in it also - it’s incredibly comfortable as a hammock. I’m pregnant (have been since we got it in April), but I plan on using it for it’s intended purpose when I’m able!!
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: great costumer service always makes for a better experience
customer_reviews.text: I was in the process of setting up. However, I lost the instructions. Went to the website and spoke with Justin. He quickly emailed me the instructions. So, first off want to say kudos to the customer service, that is my main concern with anything. I don't care if the product/food is awful, great costumer service always makes for a better experience. However, I do love the swing!! Can get my yoga/strength on without always being on the ground, getting licked by my dogs
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality yoga swing
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, everybody in my family loves to play with it. we hanged it in a living room at the trapeze. And my kids and me are taking turns to play with it. Much fun and very interesting addition to our yoga and gymnastics practice. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it a week now and absolutely love it. My 3 year old likes to hang on the straps and push me like I’m on a swing. My 17year old sister was not the least bit interested and thought it was dumb but now she is obsessed and trying to learn all the yoga tricks. If you’re looking for pain relief, flexibility and a new way to relax buy this ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: 🕉
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing! Still need to install in my house (waiting on husband) 🤣. I took it to the park and attached it to the monkey bars with the daizy straps. I was able to touch my head with my foot (for the first time) on my first try with the swing. I haven't recieved the digital instructions yet? Overall, so happy with my purchase and can't wait to play on it more
customer_reviews.author: Jamey W

customer_reviews.title: Beware ceilings covered with lath boards.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because it seems great, but it turns out the ceiling of the room where we were going to install it is covered in lath boards, so finding a stud has been a challenge. And since we don't have any good open arch ways to hang it, I now have to hire someone to install it. I'll update my review once I have it installed.
customer_reviews.author: dawnselene

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, super sturdy, great value
customer_reviews.text: I’m a bigger person and was a bit nervous that this would not hold me- but it absolutely does. The set up had very good, easy to follow instructions, and it’s a fantastic addition. I mounted mine in my basement on a steel I beam and was able to get it to the right height for me.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a yoga hammock like this for a while. This thing is really sturdy, all the different handles allow me to try the things I’ve been seeing on YouTube videos. It feels great on the my back, takes away some of the pain by stretching it out.
customer_reviews.author: alex bryantsev

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain relief, strength, flexibility and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool even if you're not a yogic (which I am not). It really helps decompress you back and the straps allow you to work every other part of your body. It's different and fun. I absolutely recommend. My husband is a rock climber and it has really helped open up his shoulders and core. Side planks are crazy hard in this!!! My only very *minor*complaint was the carabiners, my husband replaced the with roco climbing grade carabiners which are made so the rope won't fray and they wont open up. It's a very minor thing but he felt it was important.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: What did I ever do without it ?????
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this yoga swing !! I looked at several before purchasing this one and I'm so glad that I chose the Upcircleseven yoga swing. Customer service is awesome, the quality is top notch. If you're thinking about purchasing a yoga swing, go with this one.... I promise you won't regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: “Yoga swing”
customer_reviews.text: We aaaaall know what this is really for! Unfortunately my wife uses it to stretch her back and stuff. Lame. She loves it though...
customer_reviews.author: R Brown

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a WAY more expensive exercise thingie and there were 3 things wrong with it (don't need to go into that here) Anyway, this was easy to assemble and hang up. I'm hoping that with more practice my husband won't fall off the sofa laughing watching me getting into the hammock. But so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: TB-PDX

customer_reviews.title: SO ready to use this!
customer_reviews.text: This product was super easy to set up, as I have a chin-up bar built into my basement. I simply threw the straps over my bar, and connected the carabiners. It was up within a couple minutes. It's made from quality, strong material, and I started doing basic stretches and holds right away. Definitely looking forward to using it regularly and making more progress with my fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Cio

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured, arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and exactly as described. I attached it to a free standing pull-up bar/weight cage and it is perfect. Everything came ready to hang and the guide is easy to understand and informative. I highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: For more than just yoga! :)
customer_reviews.text: I mean... the kids love it. I have mine hanging from a patio structural beam using longer straps, but I plan to anchor for indoor use, too. Hung upside down and this thing has no problems supporting all 150 lbs of me. Had my son in my lap and wasn't nervous. Great price as compared to others. Would have loved some exercises printed or available via download, but I'll just keep exploring online videos. I rarely write reviews, but I'm digging this thing. Ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: Good Vibe Niki

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality with every detail accounted for!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, beautiful materials, easily adjustable, and brilliant lengths of handles. Everything I need for a safe, accommodating, beautiful relaxing workout! It checks off every detail you could be looking for in an aerial swing, whether for therapeutic purposes or a great workout! Totally impressed!
customer_reviews.author: S. Malmstrom

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones from class!
customer_reviews.text: It is early to tell but, This came in the mail today. My husband has taken it over for the last two hours! I’ve used it myself and it matches exactly to the one from class. Sturdy material easy to do a quick hang. Comes with extra handles Which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new meditation spot
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a birthday gift for my 10 year old active child and hung it up in the garage. This has become the ultimate “meditation” spot for both my kids and myself! Great to just swing or do acrobatic stunts. Super easy to install. I had it mounted to the ceiling with a bracket from a previous Ikea swing. Wish it did come with one but can see why it doesn’t die to the variation of hanging it. So far we’ve had the swing up for few days and love it!! May buy another one to take with us when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: obsessed
customer_reviews.text: i love it! it got here a day later than the shipping said it would but I think that's more of an amazon ussue since it was delivered with AMZL_US. honestly this thing is amazing and sturdy as soon as I got it in the mail I put it up and started using it. the handles and the hammock are separate items so I have yet to use the handles but I like that they aren't in my way when I use my silk.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Lanyi

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids when they’re on Covid Lockdown
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 8 year old daughter since they have us on lockdown with the Covid nonsense and don’t want her outside with fresh air and sunshine. But She loves it and uses it indoors where the Governor thinks she’s safe.
customer_reviews.author: C&H

customer_reviews.title: I know what I’ll be doing for the remainder of quarantine 😬
customer_reviews.text: Literally this is the best purchase I have made in a long time. I’m seriously so happy my swing. The quality seems very well made i don't see any loose seams or anything questionable but I will update my review after a few more months of use. I have really enjoyed taking my yoga practice to the next level with this swing and I’m bummed I didn’t buy it sooner! The quality is great and even my kids are loving it too. It also came with an online guide but I havent had a chance to view that yet...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit I am very much a yoga amateur. All the things they do on the products page I have no dream of doing. However, this swing is amazing for supported stretching. It lets me get deeper into stretches and body weight type exercises in a moderated setting. Absolutely love the strength and flexibility I have gained using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this so far! I currently have it hanging on my doorway pull-up bar and it seems to work just fine there! Originally it only came with one carabiner and it also did not include either extension strap. I emailed the company and they were extremely quick to respond and get three carabiners and two extension straps sent my way. I can’t wait to hang it in a larger area so I can have more space to really use it! But if you are right on space, the doorway does work well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Breathless experience
customer_reviews.text: I found this in my mom‘s closet so I invited the neighborhood dads over. After about two hours I had such a great stretch. They did 99% of the work while I swung in a bliss. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fat girl approved.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’11 and roughly 260ish pounds and its showing no signs of wear or strain after 2 Weeks. Use it for tight hips/ lower back issues. I hung it from a doorframe. (The swing seems sturdy but idk about my ceiling)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Something for everyone in the family.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It replaced my mesh sensory swing for my son. He had a birthday party last night and all 5 children took turns swinging in it. A couple of moms even looked online to purchase while they were playing. I enjoy doing stretching and inversion. I’m definitely a beginner but we thoroughly enjoy this! (Son is 9). Very secure. I just placed soft pad mats down to avoid injury.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

product_meta.title: UpCircleSeven Aerial Yoga Swing Set - Yoga Hammock/Sling Kit + Extension Straps & eBook - Antigravity Ceiling Hanging Yoga Sling - Inversion Swing for Beginners & Kids
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL DESIGN: Studio quality aerial swing set beautifully crafted from high strength parachute material fabric.
UNIQUE FEATURES: Large & comfortable thick padded foam handles and a spacious triple stitched swing seat pushing the boundaries of comfort during any yoga swing exercise
BONUS VALUE: 2 Multi-loop climber strength daisy chains featuring an iron-clad load capacity of 200 lbs per hanging strap ensuring your safety on any of our aerial yoga hammocks

HEALTH BENEFITS: Whether using it for inversion therapy for spinal decompression or upper body strength building such as using it as a dip stand, the versatile yoga inversion sling is sure to invigorate your health. Perfect for kids too

100% SATISFACTION PROMISE: We confidently believe in the quality of our yoga swing, we offer you an undisputed 100% satisfaction promise in the event our yoga swing does not meet or exceed your expectations
NOT INCLUDED: Mounting accessories NOT included. Must be purchased separately if required

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
